entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as having their own ways of detecting underage magic.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as being a concern for the Ministry, and Harry had to use magic to get rid of them.

entities.name: mundungus fletcher
entities.description: Mundungus Fletcher is mentioned by name, and it is stated that he will be killed by the Ministry.

entities.name: figgy
entities.description: Figgy is a nickname for Mundungus Fletcher, and he materializes in front of Harry and his friends.

entities.name: wisteria walk
entities.description: Wisteria Walk is mentioned as the location where Dementors were floating around.

relationships.description: The Ministry will kill Mundungus Fletcher, as stated by Mrs. Figg.
Harry had to use magic to get rid of Dementors in Wisteria Walk.
